alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:46AM CDT until April 25 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 14.9 feet by Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Carthage 17.0 20.4 Thu 7 am CDT 20.1 19.3 17.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
